description: Data Self-Portrait is a unique application for tracking life data and artistic visualization. By recording daily data such as sleep, consumption, mood and activities, the application transforms the dull numbers into flowing abstract art graphics, allowing you to "see" your life patterns from a new perspective. The minimalist information visualization design style, combined with the colorful data flow effect, enables your personalized data portrait to continuously evolve with each data addition, showcasing your unique life trajectory. It supports data statistics analysis, historical record management and data export functions. All data is stored locally, ensuring the protection of your privacy and security.

Why MyCash? 

Because it is the easiest, safest, and most convenient way of using cash. The MyCash wallet allows you to hold your money in one single place: your phone. With this mobile wallet, you can send money at any time, pay for items, pay your bills whenever you want, top up any Digicel prepaid phone, and receive money from abroad directly to your MyCash wallet.
MyCash is available in Fiji, Samoa, Tonga, and Vanuatu. 

What can I do with MyCash? 
•	Send money – send money from a MyCash wallet to another at any time securely and fast. 
•	Receive International Remittance – from anywhere in the world; you can directly receive money from abroad to your MyCash wallet by using digicelinternal.com or WorldRemit. 
•	Send Digicel Top Up – send Digicel credit from anywhere you are using your MyCash wallet. 
•	Pay merchants – use your MyCash wallet to pay for MyCash merchants' items by scanning the QR code displayed in their store. 
•	Pay Bills - be on top of your bills by paying them using your MyCash wallet.

Using MyCash wallet is easy, simple, and safe: 
•	Download the app and register 
•	Ask another user to send you money or visit a MyCash agent or Digicel store to load cash in your wallet 
•	Start sending money, receiving international remittance, paying to merchants, doing top up, and paying bills 

Holding your money in the MyCash wallet has no fees and sending money between MyCash wallets is free for limited time only. 


Terms & Conditions & Monthly Charges Apply*

BRED Vanuatu Connect offers the convenience of ‘Banking at your fingertips’ with an innovative online banking experience that is easier, faster and smarter than ever before.

The revamped and enhanced BRED Bank (Vanuatu) Limited mobile app makes it easy to bank on the go 24/7. Manage your everyday banking needs anywhere, anytime directly from your mobile / tablet device.
It is available to all BRED (Vanuatu) Limited customers.

Download today and enjoy the following convenience:

- CHECK ACCOUNT BALANCE(S): Staying on top of your finance(s) has never been so easy. View up-to-date account balance(s) for your account(s).

- CHECK YOUR LOAN(S): Avoid late payments by staying up-to-date with your loan(s) balance(s). BRED Vanuatu Connect provides the simplest glimpse of your loan details including repayment amount(s), payment due date(s) and much more. 

- TRANSFER MONEY: Move money between your eligible account(s) at BRED or other account(s) at BRED or to another local or international bank from the comfort of your Smartphone / tablet. 

- BILL PAYMENT: Pay your bills on-time with major registered billers in Vanuatu.
STATEMENT(S): View and download your account statement(s), bill payment history and transfer statement(s).

- CHEQUE BOOK: Order your cheque book(s) on-the-go. 
REPORT A CLAIM: This app allows you to report any claim(s), problem(s), and feedback(s) or stop your lost card(s).

- ATM & BRANCH LOCATOR: Find our ATMs and Branches by address and map.

To utilize this free service, you will need to complete a registration form at any BRED Bank Vanuatu branch to register for BRED Vanuatu Connect.

I’M A BRED CUSTOMER: If you are a BRED customer and already signed up for BRED Vanuatu Connect, please proceed and install this application.

I’M A BRED CUSTOMER BUT: If you are a BRED customer but have not signed up for BRED Vanuatu Connect, please visit your nearest BRED Bank Vanuatu branch and complete the registration processes.

WHAT YOU NEED TO REGISTER
•	Your BRED account details
•	Your current identification documents. Eg Passport, Driving License or National ID or VNPF Card
•	Your personal Smartphone
•	Your email address

FEES
There are no fees charged for new BRED Vanuatu Connect registration(s).

ONLINE GUARDIAN: Our commitment to security
Your security is our Top Priority! We take every precaution to ensure that your Mobile Banking transactions will be safe.*

*All information transmitted via BRED Vanuatu Connect is protected with highly secure encryption methods that mask sensitive information. A password or fingerprint authentication is required every time you log in on to BRED Vanuatu Connect.  

More features will be available in the next version.

TERMS & CONDITIONS APPLY.

16 million+ customers send, receive, spend and grow their money internationally with Wise. It’s the fast, simple way to move money in 160 countries and 40 currencies. Products available depend on where you live. Check wise.com or download the app to see what’s available for you.

— International money transfers —
• Send money to 70+ countries, fast
• Get the mid-market exchange rate, like on Google, for every money transfer
• On average, 64% of transfers arrive in under 20 seconds, and 95% arrive within 24 hours
• Secure your transfers with two-factor authentication, encryption and biometrics

— The debit card that’s always got the right currency —
• Spend or withdraw cash in more than 160+ countries
• If you don’t have the local currency, we’ll auto-convert what you have with the lowest possible price
• Freeze and unfreeze your card, and update your digital card details

— Get paid like a local —
• Get your own UK account number and sort code, European IBAN, Australian account details and more, as if you had local bank accounts around the world
• Use these account details to get paid in multiple currencies for free, and for direct debits
• Keep up-to-date with instant push notifications for every transaction

— Hold 40 currencies and convert between them instantly —
• No monthly fee and no maintenance fee to keep money in your account, in most cases
• Convert between currencies instantly, at the real exchange rate, for a super-low fee
• Auto-convert currencies at specific rates, and keep up to date with exchange rates with Rate Alerts

— Put your money to work with Assets —
• Try Interest or Stocks in a few taps. Available in the UK, Singapore and multiple EEA countries, for now
• Capital at risk, growth not guaranteed

— A better business account for going global —
• Pay invoices and bills faster, at a better exchange rate
• Use account details to get paid by clients and customers around the world
• Connect to supported platforms like Amazon, Stripe, Xero, and more

Wise is regulated by local authorities around the world.

Awaken your super with the new ART super app

It's easier than ever to manage your superannuation, investment options, insurance, and member details, plus so much more! 

WHO ARE WE?  

Australian Retirement Trust is one of Australia’s largest super funds, and we're proud to help our 2+ million members take control of their finances and awaken their super.  We currently take care of over $300 billion in retirement savings—that's a monster of a job!

This app is for Super Savings accounts. If you're a QSuper account holder, download the QSuper app.

FEATURES AND BENEFITS 

* New home screen and dashboard means you can check your superannuation balance in minutes
* Access Rewards for exclusive discounts and offers
* Set up additional layers of security like 4-digit passcode, Face ID, Fingerprint ID, and multi-factor authentication
* Update your personal details 
* Easily view all your linked accounts, if you have multiple
* View and/or tell us who you'd like to get your super if you die (beneficiaries)
* Review your insurance and check or update your cover
* Be notified when your superannuation has been paid and view recent transactions
* View and download your account statements
* Check and change your investment options at any time
* Help and support section to answer all your burning super questions.

You'll need to be registered for Member Online before you can access the ART super app. 

Not registered? Simply go to https://art.com.au/account/register or call us. 

* Consider the PDS and TMD at https://art.com.au/pds before joining.

​

​

Speed Wallet is the most simple, fast, and secure crypto wallet for Bitcoin (BTC), Digital Gold (XAUt), and stablecoins (USDT, USDC, & USDT-L). Whether you want to send, receive, or buy Bitcoin or gift cards, Speed Wallet gives you the tools to make crypto payments easy, low-cost, and reliable.

With Speed Wallet, you can manage Bitcoin (BTC), XAUt (Digital Gold), and stablecoins like USDT, USDC, & USDT-L all in one app. Buy Bitcoin instantly, swap to stablecoins, and enjoy a seamless crypto experience.

Core Features of Speed Wallet
- Send & Receive BTC and Bitcoin payments with ease.
- Buy Bitcoin instantly with card in simple steps.
- Lightning Network BTC payments: Experience Bitcoin with instant and low cost BTC transactions.
- Secure BTC transactions: Use Speed Wallet to store, send, and buy BTC.
- Multi-currency support: Manage BTC, XAUt and stablecoins like USDT, USDC, & USDT-L together.

Why Choose Speed Wallet for BTC, and stablecoins?
- Buy Bitcoin easily – Speed Wallet makes it simple to purchase Bitcoin or BTC directly from your app.
- USDT-L Innovation – Transact stablecoins over the Lightning Network with the efficiency of BTC payments.
- Low Fees – Whether it’s Bitcoin or stablecoins, you’ll always benefit from transparent, fair fees.
- BTC Rewards – Earn Bitcoin rewards every time you spend BTC.

Key Advantages
- Buy Bitcoin (BTC) directly from the wallet.
- Swap BTC ↔ USDT easily inside Speed Wallet.
- Store BTC in a secure Bitcoin Wallet with advanced custodial wallet protection.
- Redeem rewards in Bitcoin (BTC)
- Pay with BTC on-chain or Lightning Network for the fastest possible transactions.

Security & Compliance
Your BTC, XAUt (Digital Gold), USDC, & USDT are safe with Speed Wallet. We follow strict KYC rules in certain countries to ensure security and compliance. All Bitcoin data is handled confidentially.

Speed Rewards
Every BTC or Bitcoin transaction you make earns you rewards. The more you buy or spend BTC, the more you earn. Redeem your rewards for Bitcoin SATs and grow your balance.

Growing with Ethereum & Bitcoin
Speed Bitcoin Lightning Wallet is designed to make Bitcoin (BTC), Digital gold (XAUt)  and stablecoins accessible for everyone. Whether you’re here to buy BTC, or use USDT in payments, our Lightning Network wallet gives you the tools to explore the crypto world.

Transparent Fees
- Bitcoin (BTC) on-chain fees apply only when sending BTC on-chain.
- Lightning BTC routing fees are minimal and transparent.
- Ethereum (ETH) gas fees apply for Ethereum transfers.
- No hidden costs when you buy Bitcoin

Download Speed Wallet today and take full control of your Bitcoin (BTC), Digital gold (XAUt) and stablecoin payments (USDT, USDC, & USDT-L). Buy Bitcoin, and use with confidence.

ANZ Pacific App is our secure mobile banking app that puts your money at your fingertips. It’s now available for both personal and business customers, and you can use it anywhere – on the bus, at the beach, at home or in the office. 

Manage your everyday banking
• Move money between your accounts
• Send money to anyone with an ANZ bank account
• Send money to anyone in another local bank
• Send money overseas
• Pay bills from a list of ANZ registered billers
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Update your contact details
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ

Manage your business
• Access your Personal and Business profiles on one device
• Send money to anyone locally or overseas
• Approve transactions submitted for authorisation
• Set up and manage scheduled payments
• View and download your account statements in PDF format
• Send a secure Bank Mail to ANZ

Your money and personal details are protected because:
• ANZ Pacific App is guarded by high-grade encryption and we ensure none of your personal or banking details are stored on your device.
• Security Questions provides a second level of authentication for registration.
• ANZ Pacific App locks you out if you repeatedly use the wrong security PIN, Security Questions or password, and will time-out if the app is left running for too long with no activity.

How to get set up:
Getting the ANZ Pacific App is easy. To get it, you’ll need to be registered for ANZ Internet Banking first.
You will also need an iPhone or iPad running on iOS version 12.5 (or above).

To use the ANZ Pacific App, you must have a valid ANZ Internet Banking User ID and Password.
• Open the ANZ Pacific App and select your country
• Enter your UserID and Password (please ensure you read, understand and accept the Terms and Conditions)
• Set up a new 4-digit PIN and re-enter it to confirm
• Once you've entered your PIN you'll need to complete the two security questions, when successful, you will be able to access the ANZ Pacific App.

Important information
The ANZ Pacific App is provided by the branch of Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Limited ABN 11 005 357 operating in the jurisdiction where your account(s) is opened and held.

By installing the ANZ Pacific App you acknowledge and accept the ANZ Pacific App Terms and Conditions and agree to receive those terms and conditions and any amendments to them electronically via your mobile device. You acknowledge that ANZ will not send you a paper copy, but you can get a copy below:

Cook Islands: https://www.anz.com/cookislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Fiji: https://www.anz.com/fiji/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Kiribati: https://www.anz.com/kiribati/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Samoa: https://www.anz.com/samoa/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/
Solomon Islands: https://www.anz.com/solomonislands/en/personal/ways-bank/anz-pacific-app/

The Bitcoin.com Wallet is a multichain, self-custody Bitcoin and cryptocurrency wallet.
Key features include:

SELF-CUSTODIAL
Not even Bitcoin.com has access to your funds, and you can port your assets to another crypto wallet whenever you want.

SECURE ACCESS
Unlock your Wallet app with biometrics or PIN.

AUTOMATED BACKUP
Automatically back up all your wallets to the cloud and decrypt them with a single master password. 

CUSTOMISABLE FEES
You decide the network fee. Up the fee for faster network confirmations. Lower it when you're not in a rush. 

WIDGETS
Install live market-data widgets on your home screen. Track cryptocurrencies throughout your day.

MARKETS VIEW
Track the price action and get key info on the top cryptocurrencies.

PERSONAL NOTES
Add text to your transactions to remind you who sent what, when, and where.

SEND VIA SOCIAL
Send a payment link to anyone using any messaging app. Funds are received/claimed instantly with just one click.

CUSTOMISABLE DISPLAY CURRENCY
Choose your preferred display currency alongside your crypto (eg. USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, CAD, AUD, and more).

The ANZ Transactive – Global mobile app is a corporate mobile banking solution allowing clients access to the payments and trade functionality within ANZ Transactive – Global.

The Mobile app offers a simple, convenient and secure mobile banking experience, allowing greater visibility and control of your core cash management and trade activities across Australia, New Zealand and parts of Asia and the Pacific.

Compatible with iPhone* and iPad* mobile digital devices, ANZ Transactive – Global provides a range of features:
• Utilise the same security credentials and permissions as your web-based ANZ Transactive – Global solution
• Transact securely with multi-factor authentication technology combined with lock-out and time-out safeguards
• View real-time account balances
• View current and prior day account transactions
• View Transaction details (Payments/Receivables), including funding and beneficiary/payer details, amounts, value date and audit history
• View Loan facilities, including loan summary details, interest cycles and fees
• View Commercial Cards, including Billing Entity details, Card/Transaction details
• Approve and reject transactions (Payments/Receivables/Trade Instruments)
• Obtain a dynamic FX rate for cross currency payments
• View the status of Payments (including International Payment Tracking), Receivables and Trade transactions for up to 30 days
• Use biometric technology to access the app via Touch/Face ID for iOS
• For Australia User that requires operator assistance, user can be digitally identified and verified through ‘Contact Us’ feature  

ANZ Transactive - Global is provided in Australia, New Zealand, Cook Islands, Fiji, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Japan, Kiribati, Laos, Papua New Guinea, Philippines, Samoa, Singapore, Solomon Islands, Timor Leste, Tonga, United Kingdom, United States, Vanuatu and Vietnam by Australia and New Zealand Banking Group Limited (ACN 005 357 522) (“ANZ”) and not Apple Inc.
Some product features may not be available in all countries
* iPhone and iPad is a trademark of Apple Inc.

Binance is the world’s largest cryptoasset marketplace by trading volume*. Trusted by 250 million users worldwide, the Binance platform allows you to buy, sell, and hold up to 350 cryptoassets, including Bitcoin (BTC), Ether (ETH), Solana (SOL), Notcoin (NOT) and Pepe (PEPE) with some of the lowest trading fees in the market.

Risk Warning: Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. 
Not financial advice. All trading carries risk. Only risk capital you can afford to lose.
Take 2 mins to learn more:
https://www.binance.com/en-GB/legal/risk-warning.

Binance UK is presently not regulated or authorised by the UK Financial Conduct Authority ("FCA). Investments in cryptoassets are not covered by the Financial Ombudsman Service (“FOS”) or subject to protection under the Financial Services Compensation Scheme (“FSCS”).

Legal Entity: Nest Services Limited, trading as Binance, is the entity ultimately responsible for the Binance Services offered to UK based users through the Binance platform.

*by trading volume - Source: https://coinmarketcap.com/rankings/exchanges


Here's a small sample of what you can do on the Binance App:

- Choose from 350+ listed cryptoassets, set up recurring buys and price alerts, and trade with an arsenal of trading tools at your fingertips.
- Fund your account with a variety of payment options, including credit/debit card, P2P, and bank transfer.
- Automate your cryptoasset investments in a way that suits your preferences using Auto-Invest.
- All user funds are held 1:1 and protected by a Secure Asset Fund for Users (SAFU) worth $1 billion.
- Our ecosystem is built from the ground-up with state-of-the-art security measures, including real-time risk monitoring, stringent KYC protocols, and advanced end-to-end data encryption, to name a few.
- Participate in Binance Launchpad, or grow your portfolio with trading bots.
- In addition to an expansive, constantly-updated FAQ section, our 24/7 live chat customer support is available in English.

The mobile trading platform allows you to receive quotes of financial instruments, analyze markets using charts and technical indicators, perform demo trades, connect to brokers for live trading and view the history of trading operations.

TRADING

• Real-time quotes of financial instruments

ADVANCED FUNCTIONALITY

Download MetaTrader 5, connect to a broker and trade in financial markets!

To trade using real money, you need to open a real trading account by entering into a separate agreement with a financial company (broker), which has installed the server component of the MetaTrader 5 trading platform and has the appropriate permissions to provide financial trading service in their respective country. MetaQuotes is a software company and does not provide financial services, nor it has access to MetaTrader 5 platform servers and databases managed by financial companies.

To provide customers with secure ways of transacting via our Digital Hub, Bank of South Pacific Vanuatu offers a soft token application, dubbed BSP Vanuatu PaySecure. The application generates an authentication code that enables transactions to be completed securely while using BSP Vanuatu mobile and online banking applications.

This app turns your mobile phone or tablet into a One Time Password (OTP) generator. Each time BSP PaySecure is used, it generates a unique OTP, which is valid for 30 seconds. A new OTP will be generated once the time has elapsed.

BSP PaySecure is a safe and secure way of transacting on digital channels.

Welcome to the world of crypto

Industry-leading security

developer: Nam A Commercial Joint Stock Bank
description:
GIAO DIỆN HIỆN ĐẠI – TRẢI NGHIỆM THẾ HỆ MỚI – LÀM CHỦ CÔNG NGHỆ
Luôn chủ động đón đầu trong hành trình chuyển đổi số của ngành tài chính, Nam A Bank không ngừng cải tiến, phát triển để cho ra mắt những sản phẩm số mới hiện đại, giúp “giải phóng” khách hàng khỏi những định nghĩa và giới hạn thông thường về ngân hàng số, để khách hàng thật sự làm chủ công nghệ, làm chủ cuộc sống của chính mình. 
Dịch vụ Ngân hàng số Open Banking của Nam A Bank được phát triển dựa trên việc tích hợp các nền tảng giao dịch Internet Banking và Mobile Banking, hứa hẹn mang đến những trải nghiệm thống nhất và đỉnh cao cho khách hàng trên các phương tiện điện tử như máy tính (PC/Laptop) và thiết bị di động (điện thoại/tablet). 
Song hành cùng trình duyệt Web, Nam A Bank cho ra mắt ứng dụng Open Baking thế hệ mới được thiết kế với những đường nét công nghệ đầy sức mạnh đem lại cảm giác cao cấp, khác biệt cho khách hàng. Ứng dụng còn tích hợp những tính năng hiện đại giúp khách hàng có được sự liền mạch trong giao dịch tài chính:
-	Đăng ký dịch vụ trực tuyến với nền tảng công nghệ eKYC (Định danh điện tử).
-	Mở tài khoản số đẹp trực tuyến.
-	Chuyển khoản nhanh 247 bằng mã QR, chuyển tiền trong và ngoài hệ thống.
-	Đặt lịch chuyển tiền.
-	Mở tài khoản tiết kiệm.
-	Tra cứu thông tin tài khoản, tiết kiệm, thông tin thẻ.
-	Thực hiện giao dịch với phương thức xác thực bảo mật hiện đại đáp ứng yêu cầu an toàn của Ngân hàng nhà nước.
-	Tiện ích nổi bật khác: Giới thiệu bạn bè, tặng quà, đặt lịch hẹn, thông tin chứng khoán, …
Nam A Bank trân thành cảm ơn Quý Khách hàng đã tin yêu và lựa chọn sử dụng dịch vụ ngân hàng số của chúng tôi.
